definition: To transmit information or data from one location to another, typically through electronic means, such as radio waves or the internet. It is commonly used to describe the action of sharing or broadcasting audio, video, or text content to a specific audience or recipient.

examples.german: Ich werde dir eine E-Mail senden.
examples.english: I will send you an email.

examples.german: Kannst du mir den Link senden?
examples.english: Can you send me the link?

examples.german: Er hat mir gestern eine Nachricht gesendet.
examples.english: He sent me a message yesterday.

examples.german: Wir müssen die Datei an den Kunden senden.
examples.english: We need to send the file to the client.

examples.german: Sie senden täglich Nachrichten über das Radio.
examples.english: They broadcast news on the radio daily.
